name: Unlucky Hero
description:
This game is a submission to the Battle of the SNHU Alumni hosted by Professor Whitworth. The theme of the game jam was Inconvenient Super Powers.

Good evening, I'm Goats J. Wrangler Top story this evening BREAKING NEWS out of the town CliffTitan where a villain, causing chaos has forced residents to flee We can now identify the cause of this chaos to the notorious villain and crime boss, Joe WikiWacky Full Name Joseph WikiWacky Peck, brother to Michael, has decided to Bl1tz the sleepy little town of CliffTitan, located right off the Scheffing Shoal All residents were safely evacuated earlier today and now, we go live to CliffTitan were a response effort is underway.
